name: n8n-nodes-base.venafiTlsProtectCloudTool
semantic_context: Consume Venafi TLS Protect Cloud API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Consume Venafi TLS Protect Cloud API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

downloadItem.name: downloadItem
downloadItem.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

keystoreType.name: keystoreType
keystoreType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded
binaryProperty.ai_hint: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded

options.name: options
validityPeriod
options.description: Specify how long the issued certificate should be valid for. Use ISO8601 format.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

applicationId.name: applicationId
applicationId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
applicationId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

certificateIssuingTemplateId.displayName: Certificate Issuing Template Name or ID
certificateIssuingTemplateId.name: certificateIssuingTemplateId
certificateIssuingTemplateId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
certificateIssuingTemplateId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

commonName.name: commonName
commonName.description: The Common Name field for the certificate Subject (CN)
commonName.ai_hint: The Common Name field for the certificate Subject (CN)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: keyType
options.description: The encryption algorithm for the public key

options.name: P256
options.description: Use Elliptic Prime Curve 256 bit encryption

options.name: P384
options.description: Use Elliptic Prime Curve 384 bit encryption

options.name: P521
options.description: Use Elliptic Prime Curve 521 bit encryption

options.name: keyLength
options.description: The number of bits to allow for key generation

options.name: organization
options.description: The name of a company or organization

options.name: organizationalUnits
options.description: The name of a department or section

options.name: locality
options.description: The name of a city or town

options.name: state
options.description: The name of a state or province

values.name: Typename
values.description: What type of SAN is being used

values.name: name
values.description: The SAN friendly name that corresponds to the Type or TypeName parameter. For example, if a TypeName is IPAddress, the Name value is a valid IP address.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateId'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'downloadItem'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' AND downloadItem == 'keystore' THEN SHOW parameter 'keystoreType'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' AND downloadItem == 'keystore' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateLabel'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' AND downloadItem == 'keystore' THEN SHOW parameter 'privateKeyPassphrase'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' AND downloadItem == 'keystore' AND keystoreType == 'JKS' THEN SHOW parameter 'keystorePassphrase'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation IN ["get", "delete"] AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateId'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'certificate' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'renew' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'applicationId'
IF operation == 'renew' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'existingCertificateId'
IF operation == 'renew' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateIssuingTemplateId'
IF operation == 'renew' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateSigningRequest'
IF operation == 'renew' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'certificateRequest' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' THEN SHOW parameter 'applicationId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateIssuingTemplateId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' THEN SHOW parameter 'generateCsr'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' AND generateCsr == True THEN SHOW parameter 'commonName'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' AND generateCsr == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' AND generateCsr == False THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateSigningRequest'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateRequestId'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'certificateRequest' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
